TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DateTimePicker extends System.Windows.Forms.Control

summary.span: 表示一个 Windows 控件，该控件用来让用户选择日期和时间并以指定的格式显示此日期和时间。

span.span: Represents a Windows control that allows the user to select a date and a time and to display the date and time with a specified format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件用于允许用户选择日期和时间，并以指定的格式显示该日期和时间。The control is used to allow the user to select a date and time, and to display that date and time in the specified format. 使用控件可以轻松处理日期和时间，因为它会自动处理大量数据验证。The control makes it easy to work with dates and times because it handles a lot of the data validation automatically. > [!NOTE] > 控件仅支持公历。The control only supports Gregorian calendars. 用于表示日期时， 控件出现在两个部分：一个下拉列表，其中包含以文本表示的日期，当您单击列表旁边的向下箭头时，将显示一个日历。When used to represent a date, the control appears in two parts: a drop-down list with a date represented in text, and a calendar that appears when you click the down-arrow next to the list. 日历看起来像 控件，可以用于选择多个日期。The calendar looks like the control, which can be used for selecting multiple dates. 有关控件的详细信息 ，请参阅 [MonthCalendar 控件概述](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/monthcalendar-control-overview-windows-forms)。For more information about the control, see [MonthCalendar Control Overview](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/monthcalendar-control-overview-windows-forms). 您可以通过设置、、、 、 和 属性，更改控件的日历部分的外观。You can change the look of the calendar portion of the control by setting the , , , , , and properties. 若要使用数值调节钮控件 (也称为 up-down 控件) 若要调整日期/时间值，请将 属性设置为 `true` 。To use a spin button control (also known as an up-down control) to adjust the date/time value, set the property to `true`. 选定控件后，日历不会下拉。The calendar will not drop down when the control is selected. 可以通过单独选择每个元素并使用 "上移" 和 "下移" 按钮更改值来调整日期和时间。The date and time can be adjusted by selecting each element individually and using the up and down buttons to change the value. 属性包含控件设置为的当前日期和时间。The property contains the current date and time the control is set to. 您可以使用 属性或的相应成员 来获取日期和时间值。You can use the property or the appropriate member of to get the date and time value. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [如何：用 Windows 窗体 DateTimePicker 控件设置和返回日期](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-set-and-return-dates-with-the-windows-forms-datetimepicker-control)。For more information, see [How to: Set and Return Dates with the Windows Forms DateTimePicker Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-set-and-return-dates-with-the-windows-forms-datetimepicker-control). 可以通过设置和属性来限制可选择的日期和时间 。You can limit the dates and times that can be selected by setting the and properties. 这些值可以使用四种格式显示，由 属性设置： 、 、 或 。The values can be displayed in four formats, which are set by the property: , , , or . 默认日期 为 。The default date is . 如果希望将 显示为用于选取或编辑时间的控件而不是日期，请将 属性设置为 `true` ，并将 属性设置为 。If you want the to appear as a control for picking or editing times instead of dates, set the property to `true` and the property to . 有关详细信息，请参阅 [如何：在 DateTimePicker 控件中显示时间](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-display-time-with-the-datetimepicker-control)。For more information, see [How to: Display Time with the DateTimePicker Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-display-time-with-the-datetimepicker-control). 如果将 属性设置为 ，则可以通过设置 属性和生成自定义格式字符串来创建自己的格式样式。If the property is set to , you can create your own format style by setting the property and building a custom format string. 自定义格式字符串可以是自定义字段字符和其他文本字符的组合。The custom format string can be a combination of custom field characters and other literal characters. 例如，可以通过将 属性设置为 "MMMM dd，yyyy-dddd" 将日期显示为 "六月01，2012-星期五"。For example, you can display the date as "June 01, 2012 - Friday" by setting the property to "MMMM dd, yyyy - dddd". 有关详细信息，请参阅 [如何：使用 Windows 窗体 DateTimePicker 控件](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/display-a-date-in-a-custom-format-with-wf-datetimepicker-control) 和 [自定义日期和时间格式字符串](/dotnet/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings)以自定义格式显示日期。For more information, see [How to: Display a Date in a Custom Format with the Windows Forms DateTimePicker Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/display-a-date-in-a-custom-format-with-wf-datetimepicker-control) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](/dotnet/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings). > [!CAUTION] > 当 数据绑定且后备值更改为时 `null` ，将不会更新的值， 并且将保留以前的值。When a is data-bound and the backing value is changed to `null`, the value of the will not be updated and the previous value will be retained. 在不需要此行为的情况下 (例如，当使用一组数据绑定控件逐页浏览记录集时) 使用 类的事件 将设置 为可识别为的值 `null` 。In situations where this behavior is not desirable (for example, when using a set of data-bound controls to page through a recordset) use the event of the class to set the to a value recognizable as a `null`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个新的控件实例 ，并对其进行初始化。The following code example creates an new instance of a control and initializes it. 设置控件的 属性。The control's property is set. 此外， 设置属性以便控件显示 ，并 设置属性，使控件显示为数值调节钮控件。Also, the property is set so that the control displays a , and the property is set so that the control is displayed as a spin button control. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到窗体中，并 `CreateMyDateTimePicker` 在示例窗体的构造函数或 事件处理方法中调用方法。To run this example, paste the following code into a form and call the `CreateMyDateTimePicker` method in the example form's constructor or event handling method. summary.span: 获取或设置应用于日历的字体样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the font style applied to the calendar.

value.span: 表示应用于日历的字体样式的 。

span.span: A that represents the font style applied to the calendar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从 Windows Vista 开始，根据主题，设置此属性可能不会更改日历的外观。Starting with Windows Vista and depending on the theme, setting this property might not change the appearance of the calendar. 例如，如果将 Windows 设置为使用 Aero 主题，则设置此属性不起作用。For example, if Windows is set to use the Aero theme, setting this property has no effect. 这是因为，日历的更新版本呈现为在运行时从当前操作系统主题派生的外观。This is because an updated version of the calendar is rendered with an appearance that is derived at run time from the current operating system theme. 如果要使用此属性并启用日历的早期版本，则可以禁用应用程序的视觉样式。If you want to use this property and enable the earlier version of the calendar, you can disable visual styles for your application. 禁用视觉样式可能会影响应用程序中其他控件的外观和行为。Disabling visual styles might affect the appearance and behavior of other controls in your application. 若要禁用 Visual Basic 中的视觉样式，请打开项目设计器并取消选中 " **启用 XP 视觉样式** " 复选框。To disable visual styles in Visual Basic, open the Project Designer and uncheck the **Enable XP visual styles** check box. 若要在 c # 中禁用视觉样式，请打开 Program.cs 并注释掉 `Application.EnableVisualStyles();` 。To disable visual styles in C#, open Program.cs and comment out `Application.EnableVisualStyles();`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to initialize the property. 此示例创建一个新的 控件，将它添加到的 集合 ，然后将属性初始化 为动态定义的 。This example creates a new control, adds it to the collection of a , and then initializes the property to a dynamically defined . [!code-cpp[DateTimePicker.CalendarFont#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DateTimePicker.CalendarFont/CPP/calendarfont.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DateTimePicker.CalendarFont#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DateTimePicker.CalendarFont/CS/calendarfont.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DateTimePicker.CalendarFont#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DateTimePicker.CalendarFont/VB/calendarfont.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建时 ，此属性最初设置为等于 字段值。When a is created, this property is initially set equal to the field value. 尾随日期是上个月的结束日期或下个月用于填充日历的开始日期。The trailing dates are the ending dates from the previous month or the beginning dates from the next month used to fill the calendar. 从 Windows Vista 开始，根据主题，设置此属性可能不会更改日历的外观。Starting with Windows Vista and depending on the theme, setting this property might not change the appearance of the calendar. 例如，如果将 Windows 设置为使用 Aero 主题，则设置此属性不起作用。For example, if Windows is set to use the Aero theme, setting this property has no effect. 这是因为，日历的更新版本呈现为在运行时从当前操作系统主题派生的外观。This is because an updated version of the calendar is rendered with an appearance that is derived at run time from the current operating system theme. 如果要使用此属性并启用日历的早期版本，则可以禁用应用程序的视觉样式。If you want to use this property and enable the earlier version of the calendar, you can disable visual styles for your application. 禁用视觉样式可能会影响应用程序中其他控件的外观和行为。Disabling visual styles might affect the appearance and behavior of other controls in your application. 若要禁用 Visual Basic 中的视觉样式，请打开项目设计器并取消选中 " **启用 XP 视觉样式** " 复选框。To disable visual styles in Visual Basic, open the Project Designer and uncheck the **Enable XP visual styles** check box. 若要在 c # 中禁用视觉样式，请打开 Program.cs 并注释掉 `Application.EnableVisualStyles();` 。To disable visual styles in C#, open Program.cs and comment out `Application.EnableVisualStyles();`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于获取在属性值为时显示的复选框的状态 `true` 。This property is used to obtain the state of the check box that is displayed if the property value is `true`. 如果 属性值为 `true` ，则控件将 显示格式正确的 属性值; 否则，控件将显示分配给该属性的最后一个有效日期/时间值， 如果从未赋值，则为当前日期和时间 () 。If the property value is `true`, the control displays the properly formatted property value; otherwise, the control displays the last valid date/time value assigned to the property or the current date and time () if no value has ever been assigned.

span.span: A string that represents the custom date/time format.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要显示包含日期和时间分隔符的字符串文本或设置字符串格式，必须在子字符串中使用转义符。To display string literals that contain date and time separators or to format strings, you must use escape characters in the substring. 例如，若要将日期显示为 "6 月15日下午 12:00"，请将 "t:mm tt" 的属性设置为 "MMMM dd"。For example, to display the date as "June 15 at 12:00 PM", set the property to "MMMM dd 'at' t:mm tt". 如果 "at" 子字符串未由转义符括起来，则结果为 "6 月 15 aP 12： 00 ("，因为 "t" 字符是以一字母 A.M./P.M。If the "at" substring is not enclosed by escape characters, the result is "June 15 aP 12:00PM" because the "t" character is read as the one-letter A.M./P.M. 格式字符串 (参见下面的格式字符串表) 。format string (see the format string table below). 可以组合格式字符串以设置日期和时间的格式。The format strings can be combined to format the date and time. 例如，若要将日期和时间显示为 06/15/2001 12:00 PM，则应将此属性设置为 "MM"/"dd"/"yyyy hh"： "mm tt"。For example, to display the date and time as 06/15/2001 12:00 PM, this property should be set to "MM'/'dd'/'yyyy hh':'mm tt". 有关详细信息，请参阅 [自定义日期和时间格式字符串](/dotnet/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings)。For more information, see [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](/dotnet/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings). > [!NOTE] > 属性必须设置为， 此属性才能影响所显示日期和时间的格式。The property must be set to for this property to affect the formatting of the displayed date and time. 下表列出了所有有效的格式字符串及其说明。The following table lists all the valid format strings and their descriptions. |格式字符串Format string|说明Description| |-------------------|-----------------| |dd|一位数或两位数表示的日期。The one- or two-digit day.| |dddd|两位数表示的日期。The two-digit day. 一位数的日期值前面带有0。Single-digit day values are preceded by a 0.| |dddddd|三个字符的星期缩写形式。The three-character day-of-week abbreviation.| |dddddddd|完整的星期几名称。The full day-of-week name.| |hh|12小时格式的一位数或两位数小时。The one- or two-digit hour in 12-hour format.| |hhhh|采用12小时制的两位数小时格式。The two-digit hour in 12-hour format. 单个数字值前面带有0。Single digit values are preceded by a 0.| |HH|24小时格式的一位数或两位数小时。The one- or two-digit hour in 24-hour format.| |HHHH|以24小时格式表示的两位数小时。The two-digit hour in 24-hour format. 单个数字值前面带有0。Single digit values are preceded by a 0.| |mm|一位或两位数字的分钟数。The one- or two-digit minute.| |MMmm|用两位数表示的分钟数。The two-digit minute. 单个数字值前面带有0。Single digit values are preceded by a 0.| |MM|一位数或两位数的月份数。The one- or two-digit month number.| |MMMM|两位数的月份数。The two-digit month number. 单个数字值前面带有0。Single digit values are preceded by a 0.| |MMMMMM|三个字符的月份缩写。The three-character month abbreviation.| |MMMMMMMM|完整的月份名称。The full month name.| |ss|一位数或两位数秒。The one- or two-digit seconds.| |ssss|两位数秒数。The two-digit seconds. 单个数字值前面带有0。Single digit values are preceded by a 0.| |Tt|/P.M. 凌晨1个字母The one-letter A.M./P.M. 缩写 (A.M。abbreviation (A.M. 显示为 "A" ) 。is displayed as "A").| |tttt|两个字母 A.M./P.M。The two-letter A.M./P.M. 缩写 (A.M。abbreviation (A.M. 显示为 "AM" ) 。is displayed as "AM").| |yy| (2001 的一位数年份显示为 "1" ) 。The one-digit year (2001 is displayed as "1").| |yyyy| (2001 的年份的最后两位数字将显示为 "01" ) 。The last two digits of the year (2001 is displayed as "01").| |yyyyyyyy| (2001 的完整年份显示为 "2001" ) 。The full year (2001 is displayed as "2001").| ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置 属性，以便 将日期显示为 "六月01，2001-星期五"。The following code example sets the property so that the will display the date as "June 01, 2001 - Friday". 此代码假设已 在上创建控件的一个实例 。This code assumes that an instance of a control has been created on a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 属性设置为时 `true` ，数值调节钮控件 (也称为 up-down 控件) 而不是下拉日历）用于调整时间值。When the property is set to `true`, a spin button control (also known as an up-down control), rather than a drop-down calendar, is used to adjust time values. 可以通过单独选择每个元素并使用 "上移" 和 "下移" 按钮更改值来调整日期和时间。The date and time can be adjusted by selecting each element individually and using the up and down buttons to change the value. 若要仅在中显示时间 ，请将 属性设置为 ，并将属性设置 为 `true` 。To display only time in a , set the property to , and the property to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个新的控件实例 ，并对其进行初始化。The following code example creates an new instance of a control and initializes it. 设置控件的 属性。The control's property is set. 此外， 设置属性以便控件显示 ，并 设置属性，使控件显示为数值调节钮控件。Also, the property is set so that the control displays a , and the property is set so that the control is displayed as a spin button control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的字符串等效于 应用了正确格式设置或自定义格式设置的属性。The string returned by this property is equivalent to the property with the appropriate formatting or custom formatting applied. 例如，如果将属性 设置为 "DDDD，MMMM dd，yyyy"，则属性设置为 06/01/2001 12:00:00 AM，则 属性值为 "星期五，六月01，2001"。For example, if the property is set to 06/01/2001 12:00:00 AM while the property is set to "dddd, MMMM dd, yyyy", the property value is "Friday, June 01, 2001". 设置此属性时，字符串必须可转换为类的实例 。When setting this property, the string must be convertible to an instance of the class. 可以定义一种自定义格式，使字符串不能转换为有效的 值。It is possible to define a custom format that results in a string that cannot be converted to a valid value. 因此，如果从属性返回的字符串 传递回属性，则可能会导致错误 。Because of this, the string returned from the property might cause an error if it is passed back to the property. 如果字符串无法转换为日期/时间值，则 类将引发 。If the string cannot be converted to a date/time value, the class throws a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 未在代码或用户中更改该属性，则将其设置为当前日期和时间 () 。If the property has not been changed in code or by the user, it is set to the current date and time (). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来检索当前日期值。The following code example demonstrates how use the property to retrieve the current date value. 首先，该示例显示 属性。First, the example displays the property. 然后，该示例将 属性递增一天，并再次显示该属性值。The example then increments the property by one day and displays the property value again. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在引发此事件之前验证用户输入。User input is validated before this event is raised. 当输入的日期早于或晚于时，不会引发此事件 。This event is not raised when the entered date is earlier than or later than . 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `DateTimePicker1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DateTimePicker1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
